original_text: And Laban answered and said unto Jacob, These daughters are my daughters, and these children are my children, and these cattle are my cattle, and all that thou seest is mine: and what can I do this day unto these my daughters, or unto their children which they have born?
korean_text: 라반이 야곱에게 대답하여 이르되 딸들은 내 딸이요 자식들은 내 자식이요 양 떼는 내 양 떼요 네가 보는 것은 다 내 것이라 내가 오늘 내 딸들과 그들이 낳은 자식들에게 무엇을 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: And Laban answered and said unto Jacob,
and these children are my children,
and these cattle are my cattle,
and all that thou seest is mine:
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 보는 모든 것이 내 것이며

sentences.original_text: and what can I do this day
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 오늘 무엇을 할 수 있겠느냐
